title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and add the pecorino cheese.
Drain the pasta and add to the pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture and toss to combine.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
In a pan, heat tomato puree and simmer.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce.
Stir in cream and cook for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
